reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, saying it makes them feel like princesses, and appreciate its true-to-size fit that accommodates larger chests. The dress is comfortable, with one customer noting the stretchy mesh material, and customers like its perfect color and flattering design that hides belly fat. While some customers describe the material as nice, others find it cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and comfortable!
items.body: Bought this in light blue/small for my daughter, who is 5â€™3â€ and 120 lbs. It fits beautifully and is really pretty- perfect for parties, weddings, etc. Itâ€™s floaty (but not fussy) and comfortable. Read more
items.author: anon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: Great for a girls daddy daughter dance. She was comfortable, and loved it. She felt so pretty. It washes well on delicate, and I hang dry it. Itâ€™s pretty sturdy even though I consider it delicate mostly in the sleeves. There have been no wrinkles. No weird smells. Great length (about the knee) for a girl on the taller side. (Sheâ€™s 11 and 5â€™5) I would say beware of bras with it because the neckline is loose. Read more
items.author: Katie B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and well-made
items.body: Very cute and well-made. Sizing is spot on my daughter wore this for a baby shower and received a ton of compliments. Read more
items.author: Amber Sanchez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Soft! Almost Perfect!
items.body: I love it! I bought this dress for the upcoming renaissance faire so I could dress up as a nymph. The color is perfect, and I wore it with a corset which made the dress look even better. The material is stretchy and flowy.. but not tacky! The thinner parts look great in the sun, it's an easy wash and pretty durable (so far). Fits so well and compliments my figure beautifully.. I only wish this dress had pockets, that would REALLY make it 5 stars for me! âœ¨ðŸ‘â¤ï¸ Read more
items.author: Rayna Guerrero-Vanderbusse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & comfortable
items.body: I bought this to wear to a wedding and loved it. Itâ€™s cute, the perfect length, flattering, and very comfortable. Iâ€™ll definitely be wearing it again for a date night or event! Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable but the zipper popped
items.body: Update: I dropped down to three stars cause the material is great but thank god I didnâ€™t wear it out cause my zipper popped open before we left the house completely exposing my side. Iâ€™m not sure why since the dress was not tight at all on me and felt very comfortable but Iâ€™m disappointed that I wasnâ€™t even able to wear the dress out after trying it on. This dress is so comfortable!! Iâ€™m 230lbs and 40D got the XL and it fit super good! It was flattering and the material is very stretchy so I didnâ€™t even have to undo the zipper to get it on (zipper is on the left side under the arm area and it isnâ€™t even noticeable if anyone was curious). It is a bit see through on the breast area so Iâ€™d wear something under it just to be safe but the rest of the dress was pretty thick (still breathable though!) Iâ€™m 5â€™0 and it goes down to my knees. Iâ€™d like it to be bit shorter but Iâ€™m short myself so I donâ€™t consider it a product flaw. Overall super good quality and I love it! Read more
items.author: Cristie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress
items.body: This dress is gorgeous. I got it for one of my daughters who usually has a tough time finding dresses with the right fit since she has an hour glass figure. But this dress is perfect for her. And the color did not disappoint. I am glad I found this dress. The dress does have a lining, so it is not sheer. My daughter looks stunning in it and the fit is perfect and classy. Read more
items.author: Amazon Prime Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the dressâ€” went excellent with my shoes!
items.body: So beautiful!! I felt like Cinderella! Got this dress for homecoming, and letâ€™s just say, I was not disappointed!! Itâ€™s so elegant and classy, and I really felt like a princess (especially because of those flowy sleeves!) Read more
items.author: Abs

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Browm, Blue, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Wine Red, Pink, White, Watermelon Red, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
